--- title: Double DQN keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Using the target model to also evaluate the value of the actions taken by the current model" description: "Using the target model to also evaluate the value of the actions taken by the current model" nb_path: "nbs/10c_agents.dqn.double.ipynb" ---

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DoubleDQNTrainer[source]

DoubleDQNTrainer(n_batch=0, target_sync=300, discount=0.99, n_steps=1) :: DQNTargetTrainer

Basic class handling tweaks of the training loop by changing a Learner in various events

Parameters:

  • n_batch : <class 'int'>, optional

  • target_sync : <class 'int'>, optional

  • discount : <class 'float'>, optional

  • n_steps : <class 'int'>, optional

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dqn=DQN(4,2)
agent=Agent(dqn,cbs=[ArgMaxFeed,DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect])
source=Src('CartPole-v1',agent,seed=0,steps_count=1,n_envs=1,steps_delta=1,cbs=[GymSrc,FirstLast])

dls=SourceDataBlock(
    blocks=SourceBlock(source)
).dataloaders([source],n=1000,bs=1,num_workers=0)

learn=Learner(dls,agent,loss_func=MSELoss(),
              cbs=[ExperienceReplayCallback(bs=32,max_sz=100000,warmup_sz=32),DoubleDQNTrainer],
              metrics=[Reward,Epsilon])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
full=False
learn.fit(47 if full else 3,lr=0.0001,wd=0)
epoch train_loss train_reward train_epsilon valid_loss valid_reward valid_epsilon time
0 10.987865 51.880000 0.200000 00:25
1 9.961967 55.730000 0.200000 00:26
2 8.178653 56.950000 0.200000 00:25
{% endraw %}
